alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bryan; Coastal Chatham; Coastal Liberty; Inland Bryan; Inland Chatham; Inland Liberty (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 3:02PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF BRYAN, LIBERTY AND CHATHAM COUNTIES... At 301 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Richmond Hill. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph and excessive cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. All outdoor activities should cease. Move indoors immediately. Some locations in the path of this storm include... Richmond Hill, Coffee Bluff, Windsor Forest, Montgomery, Midway, Vernonburg, Fort Mcallister, and Belfast. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so. You can also email your report to nws.charlestonsc@noaa.gov.
